dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Man, this is some good wine~ Anotha bottle, please... Heheheh.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Hangover? What hangover~? As long as I never sober up, I can be on cloud nine all day, eh? Eh?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: C'mon, you're off duty today, ain'tcha? Day drinking on off hours is a-ok! C'mere, sit down. 'Scuse me! Can we get a pair of chopsticks and a shot glass here?

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg:
Ngh... It gets pretty rowdy out there at night, eh?
Oh, hey! All good out there? Then c'mere and join me~ Been a while since I got ya a drink, huh?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: There ain't much to being a part of a Syndicate~ Just do as you're told and kill as you're told! Keep doin' that, get yourself some underlings, and so on. Know what I mean?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg:
Oh, those, uh... Blade Rummage... no. Blunder Lineage... was it?
Huh, we're attacking them tonight? Whew... time sure does fly, huh?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: Hey, hey! Are ya really about to go into battle without a shot of pre-battle drink? Come on, we'll share a liquor bowl and do some team buildin' before a big fight! Can't have ya going in there dry, huh?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
Gotcha. So they're the vagrants from S Corp.?
Are the boys ready? Good, let's remind 'em whose turf they're treading on. Charge!

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg:
Are you seriously still blitzed? What'd I say? What do I always say? Drink when you gotta drink, and sober up when you gotta sober up.
Haah... I'll keep this short. Just do double your usual numbers, and I won't get mad. C'mon, go!

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: Mmhm~ Man, I'm already starting to sober up. You don't mind if I get started first, do ya?

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg:
Hooah... My mind's clearer than ever, man. And with this delicious cig...
I'd say I'm in peak physical shape... to wreck shop.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Huh? We're leaving? Now?

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Ahm, hah! Right, now I'm all sobered up!

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: I told you, I don't talk and fight! ... So what is it?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: First try!

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: What got you all wobbly?

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Agh...

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: Man, what a letdown.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Is my last thought... really gonna be... about... that drink I left back home...?

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Oh! Hey, that worked! Do I get a prize?

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: My bad, my bad... I've got a shaky hand, you know~

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg:
Well, at least that wasn't a complete disaster...
Guys. Yeah, you guys. Was this really, really the best you could do?

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg:
Hm~ Now that's what I call a satisfying result! Perfect, then tonight's a team drinking night! Wait 'till I come back with the Patriarch's card.
None of you are allowed to sit this one out, got it?

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: ... No dinner for anyone tonight. Go back to the office and remain on standby because I'm going to teach you all a lesson. Prepare to see some shit, you useless bastards...!
